node.title: Queensland brings forward softening of border rules with passes available from this afternoon
node.alt: Premier Annastacia Palaszczuk providing COVID-19 update at Burleigh
node.description: The Queensland government brings forward the opening of the state's border to some fully vaccinated travellers from interstate COVID-19 hotspots, with people able to apply for their border passes from 5:00pm today.
node.content: ["The Queensland government has brought forward the opening of the state's border to\u00a0some fully vaccinated travellers from interstate\u00a0COVID-19 hotspots,\u00a0with\u00a0people able to apply for their border passes\u00a0from 5:00pm today.", "The state passed a\u00a070 per cent double vaccination of those over\u00a016 target yesterday, paving the way for the reopening of the border, which was initially expected this\u00a0Friday.", "It is the first major milestone as part of the\u00a0roadmap toward fully reopening borders and living with the virus.", "Data shows 81.99 per cent of\u00a0Queenslanders over 16\u00a0\u2014\u00a0or 3.37 million people \u2014 have received at least one dose of a COVID-19 vaccine and 70.25 per cent have had two shots.", "It comes as the state records no new locally acquired cases, and two cases in hotel quarantine.", "More than 5,644 tests were conducted on Sunday and Queensland Health administered 16,985 vaccinations in the past 24 hours.", "Anyone\u00a0seeking to enter\u00a0the state from the hotspots of Victoria, New South Wales and the ACT,\u00a0or if they have been to one in the last 14 days, will need to have two doses of a COVID-19\u00a0vaccine, with their second shot\u00a0being administered at least two weeks before entering the state.", "They will also need to arrive by air, have proof of a negative TGA-approved COVID test within the previous 72 hours, and have applied for a border pass.", "They will also need to home quarantine for 14 days, and only if their home is within\u00a0two hours of an\u00a0airport.", "Health Minister Yvette D'Ath said border passes would be issued instantly.", "\"Today is the day that you can start putting in place your travel arrangements,\" Ms D'Ath said.", "\"So start booking your flights, if you're fully vaccinated \u2013 go get your [COVID-19] test, as soon as it's negative and your flight's booked, your border pass will be instant.\"", "More to come."]
